p: Since the development of the 2019-nCoV epidemic, China has recommended RT-PCR technology as a guideline for the COVID-19 diagnosis and treatment program ( 21). The Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends the use of primers and fluorescent probes (FAM, BHQ1 and TAMRA) targeting 2019-nCoV ORF1ab and nucleocapsid protein (N) gene regions ( Table I) ( 23).
